name: Charizard Go!
description:
Reach new heights! Upgrade Charizard's skills! Capture all pokemon!

This game was made for the 2022 Game Dev Beginners Game Jam, which ran in the last week in December. The theme was 'nostalgia'. I used Godot as my game engine.

Sound effects by JDWasabi: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack
Music by nene: https://opengameart.org/content/long-away-home-8bit
